import React, { Component } from 'react' export class Form extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { question: '', option1: '', option2: '', option3: '', option4: '', answer: '' } } handleChange = (event) => { var inputName = event.target.name; if(inputName === 'txtQuestion'){ alert(inputName) } else if(inputName === 'txtOption1') { alert(inputName) } } render() { return (
Answers

) } } export default Form
